email_sequences.subject: Your 2 Google Reviews: Losing You Jobs?
email_sequences.body: Manu here. Saw imi Concrete only has 2 Google reviews. That's a trust barrier costing you new work. I fix contractor problems like this fast. Can you tell me what 2-3 new jobs would mean for you? Reply here.

email_sequences.subject: Re: Your 2 Google Reviews: Losing You Jobs?
email_sequences.body: Following up on your Google reviews. Most contractors I analyze with low review counts are losing out on significant projects. I have data from 5,500+ contractors showing how to fix this without hassle. What's the biggest challenge you face getting new leads? Let me know.

email_sequences.subject: Re: Your 2 Google Reviews: Losing You Jobs?
email_sequences.body: Still thinking about your Google reviews and what it means for imi Concrete's growth. My process is quick, no-overhead, and gets results. I don't have testimonials yet, but I have the data. Want to see how we can get you more reviews and more jobs? Email me back.
